text:
Hi all,
I created a public CRM Card not listed on the marketplace last year. Do I have to rebuild it with App Card (UI Extension) ? Do HUbSpot have planned to block this type of CRM Cards ? It's still working
Thanks for your informations :pray:

<@U06H94JKK1P> and <@U0488SNUMUJ>, Sejal flagged this to me. :slightly_smiling_face:

I'm the PM for Playbooks and we're looking to rebuild Playbooks into a new tool that's more powerful - has conditional sections, can include app cards / custom cards, etc.

It sounds like it might be right up your alley with what you're building custom. I'd love to chat more if you're up for it!

Here's a sneak peak at an <https://www.loom.com/share/23eacab0e9be480ebb0cc7ad4e555831?sid=ca9ae7ee-8139-495f-9c77-ea881de5eb82|early prototype> and <https://www.HubSpot.com/meetings/whien1|my meetings link to book time>!
Thanks Winnie! That looks really interesting, I'll definitely book something in with you on this

Hello Team!
:mega::mega::mega: Super excited to announce that we are officially live with our *<https://www.figma.com/community/file/1446579606498505952/HubSpot-extensibility-design-kit|Figma Design Kit in Community>*:tada: It is available to everyone now and there is no need to request access anymore. You can access this link from the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/ui-components/figma-design-kit|docs page here> as well. This move means we have new features available such as open access without a password and a changelog for tracking changes.

We've already seen lots of great mocks and we're excited for this to speed up development & improve stakeholder communication :slightly_smiling_face: Thank you for everyone who has been a part of the beta!
Do you happen to be using Flex and Box components?
I think if you put those in a Flex and each dropdown in a Box, you can have them stretch and grow and drop down a line if necessary
